_header: The mighty Maker that made all thing
_description: Discussion between Occupation, Idleness, Doctrine and Cleanness — 877 lijnes in various stanzaic patterns

Winches33.First Lines:
The myȝty maker that made al thyngehe medle his mercy euer in
                    oure mende…
Winches33.Last Lines:
…kepe ȝou euer oute of all dispeyreand graunte ȝou
                    his blissynge euerychone
